allow: Bash(!gemini -p "I''m analyzing a Base44 no-code AI platform ecosystem with 59 collected app templates. Each app is a React/Vite structure with @base44/sdk integration. The project aims to: 1) Create an application taxonomy using NLP/topic modeling, 2) Develop a complexity assessment rubric, 3) Analyze community sentiment. Current data shows standard React patterns with Radix UI components. What specific analysis approaches would you recommend for: a) Extracting meaningful app features/complexity from source code, b) Identifying unique patterns that distinguish app categories, c) Novel metrics for no-code app quality assessment? Focus on data mining techniques suitable for this codebase structure.")
